data.title: The Right Stuff (DVD, 1997) Ed Harris Scott Glenn Dennis Quaid Factory Sealed 85392002726
data.meta_description:
Experience the thrill of space travel and aviation history with "The Right Stuff" DVD. Directed by Philip Kaufman, this drama film features an all-star cast, including Ed Harris, Scott Glenn, and Dennis Quaid. Join the journey of the Mercury Seven astronauts as they compete to be the first Americans in space in the late 1950s and early 1960s.


This DVD comes in a snapper case and has a runtime of 193 minutes. It is rated G and features widescreen format with NTSC video and English, French, and Spanish subtitles. The movie was released in 1983 and is a Warner Bros. production. Grab your copy now and relive the excitement of this iconic moment in history!
